name: Funambulism
description:
Funambulism - noun

1. tightrope walking

Do you have the grit and skill to walk across a thin rope suspended in the air?

Well... maybe not, but hey you can play this game to get a sense (sort of)

Controls:

     W or UP to walk forwards

     A/D or LEFT/RIGHT to balance

Assets:

MusicAntti LuodeFontDaniel Linssen

Made for Weekly Game Jam 65

     - 'Watch Your Step'

(Global leaderboard of times included)
